Sponsors

If you want to become Sponsor of ICON 2022, please, have a look at the ICON 2022 Sponsorship details below and get in touch. We solicit sponsorship from leading organizations in this space, which will give those organizations a unique opportunity to showcase their companies to hundreds of data scientists, AI practitioners, and students from around the world. The conference will give sponsors access to current research, high quality workshops, and tutorials taught by leaders in their respective fields. Sponsors will also have a chance to interact with and recruit top-notch talent. Details of sponsorship tiers and benefits are described below. I

Interested firms can reach out to us at icon2022@iiitd.ac.in with the subject "ICON 2022 - SPONSORSHIP".

Sponsorship Offer
  • Gold Sponsorship   -   1 lakh
  • Silver Sponsorship   -   50 Thousand
  • Bronze Sponsorship   -   25 Thousand
Benefits for Sponsorship:
  • Free registration (Gold-10; Silver-6; Bronze-4).
  • Sponsor logo/signage prominently displayed onsite and on conference website.
  • Sponsors can organize separate sessions during the conference to showcase themselves.
  • Free online platform and/or separate room to organize the sessions to attract the prospective employees.

The site is being managed by LCS2 Lab
